Source.Name: nushell
Source.Description: Nu takes cues from a lot of familiar territory traditional shells like bash, object based shells like PowerShell, gradually typed languages like TypeScript, functional programming, systems programming, and more. But rather than trying to be a jack of all trades, Nu focuses its energy on doing a few things well

Package.Name: nushell
Package.Description: Nu takes cues from a lot of familiar territory traditional shells like bash, object based shells like PowerShell, gradually typed languages like TypeScript, functional programming, systems programming, and more. But rather than trying to be a jack of all trades, Nu focuses its energy on doing a few things well
